name: Duck n' Dodge
summary:
Duck n' Dodge is a platforming title inspired by classic Atari games and modern endless runners. Race to the end while avoiding bullets, blades, and colorful enemies.

Features:

-Challenging yet forgiving platforming gameplay
-Proceedural Level Generation. Never play exactly the same way twice!
-Original In-Game Soundtrack
-A robust level editor, allowing users to design and play their own levels
-Multiple playable gamemodes

Duck n' Dodge is currently in a state of closed Alpha, and is planned for release as a Steam Early Access title in early 2018.
